SEARCH
Package env

Class BlackForestEnvironment

java.lang.Object
jason.environment.Environment
env.BlackForestEnvironment
All Implemented Interfaces:
MapEnvironment
public class BlackForestEnvironment extends jason.environment.Environment implements MapEnvironment
The `BlackForestEnvironment` class extends the `Environment` class and implements `MapEnvironment`. It provides an interface between the AgentSpeak agents and the simulation world. This class is responsible for handling percepts, actions, and interactions between agents and the game environment. It ensures that multi-agent behaviors are synchronized with the simulation model (`BlackForestModel`).

    • initializeAgentIfNeeded

      public Agent initializeAgentIfNeeded(String agentName)
      Initializes an agent if it does not already exist in the model. If the agent exists, returns the existing agent. Otherwise, creates a new instance based on the agent's name pattern.

    • getPercepts

      public Collection<jason.asSyntax.Literal> getPercepts(String agentName)
      Retrieves the percepts (sensory information) for a given agent. This includes personal beliefs, surrounding tiles, and objects within range.
      Specified by:
      getPercepts in interface MapEnvironment
      Overrides:
      getPercepts in class jason.environment.Environment
      Parameters:
      agentName - The name of the agent whose percepts are retrieved.
      Returns:

    • surroundingPercepts

      public Collection<jason.asSyntax.Literal> surroundingPercepts(Agent agent)
      Retrieves the percepts related to the agent's immediate surroundings. Includes information about obstacles, allies, enemies, structures, and zone types. This information is employed to conduct the movements logic and to apply the zone and structure effect if there is one.
      Specified by:
      surroundingPercepts in interface MapEnvironment
      Parameters:
      agent - The agent whose surrounding percepts are retrieved.
      Returns:
      A collection of literals representing the agent's surroundings.

    • inRangePercepts

      public Collection<jason.asSyntax.Literal> inRangePercepts(Agent agent)
      Retrieves percepts for objects or entities within the agent’s range. Includes nearby agents, gates, trees, and princesses. This information is used by the agents to acknowledge when they can interact with artifacts or other agents.
      Specified by:
      inRangePercepts in interface MapEnvironment
      Parameters:
      agent - The agent whose in-range percepts are retrieved.
      Returns:
      A collection of literals representing objects in range.

    • executeAction

      public boolean executeAction(String ag, jason.asSyntax.Structure action)
      Executes an action requested by an agent. Handles movement, attacks, healing, picking up resources (princesses), and interactions with structures.
      Specified by:
      executeAction in interface MapEnvironment
      Overrides:
      executeAction in class jason.environment.Environment
      Parameters:
      ag - The name of the agent performing the action.
      action - The action structure containing the action type and parameters.
      Returns:
      True if the action is successfully executed, false otherwise.
